person_say: I'm having problems working with my team and it's delaying our progress.
animal_say: Are you looking for ways to manage your time better, or do you need help with communication in your team? I'm here to help you find the right animal specialist for that!

person_say: Yes, meeting Bizy sounds great! I would love to boost my communication skills and get those tasks done.
